00068   UInt_t getGeometricalCellIndex(UInt_t module_index,  UInt_t cell_index) const 
00069 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00070     throw (range_error)
00071 #endif
00072   {
00073 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00074     if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size() || _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00075         std::stringstream message;
00076         message << "Alignment::getGeometricalCellIndex> Module " << module_index << " is not defined or module type does not exist.";
00077         throw range_error(message.str());
00078     }
00079 #endif
00080     UInt_t module_type=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType();
00081 
00082     return 
00083         _moduleTypeList[module_type].getGeometricalCellIndex(cell_index)
00084         +_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getCellIndexOffset();
00085   };

00090   bool isValid(UInt_t module_index) const
00091 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00092     throw (range_error)
00093 #endif
00094   {
00095 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00096     if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size()) {
00097         std::stringstream message;
00098         message << "Alignment::isValid> Module index " << module_index << " is out of range.";
00099         throw range_error(message.str());
00100     }
00101 #endif
00102     return _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType() < _moduleTypeList.size();
00103   }

00129   ThreeVector_t getPosition(UInt_t module_index, UInt_t cell_index) const
00130 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00131     throw (range_error)
00132 #endif
00133   {
00134 
00135 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00136     if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size() || _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00137         std::stringstream message;
00138         message << "Alignment::getPosition> Module " << module_index << "is not defined.";
00139         throw range_error(message.str());
00140     }
00141     
00142     if (cell_index>=_moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()].getNCells()) {
00143         std::stringstream message;
00144         message << "Alignment::getPosition> cell index " << cell_index << " is out of range for module of type "
00145                 << (int) _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType() << ".";
00146         throw range_error(message.str());
00147     }
00148 #endif
00149 
00150     ThreeVector_t a_position;
00151 
00152     const pair<UInt_t, ModuleLocation> &the_location=_moduleLocationList[module_index];
00153     const ModuleDescription &the_module_type=_moduleTypeList[the_location.second.getModuleType()];
00154 
00155     a_position[0]=  the_location.second.getX()
00156                   + the_module_type.getCellXPos(cell_index);
00157 
00158     a_position[1]=  the_location.second.getY()
00159                   + the_module_type.getCellYPos(cell_index);
00160 
00161     a_position[2]=  the_location.second.getZ();
00162 
00163 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00164     std::cout << "Module Index: " << module_index << std::endl;
00165     std::cout << "Module X Position: " << the_location.second.getX() << std::endl;
00166     std::cout << "x position: " << a_position[0] << std::endl;
00167 #endif
00168 
00169     //CRP 20/12/06 Commented out since it requires new ModuleDescription Class
00170     //Might be re-activated later
00171     //    if (the_module_type.hasCellZPos()) {
00172     //  a_position[2] += the_module_type.getCellZPos(cell_index);
00173     //}
00174     return transformPosition(a_position);
00175   };
00176 
00177   ThreeVector_t transformPosition(ThreeVector_t &a_position) const {
00178 
00179     if (_detectorAngleZX[kEffective]!=0.) {
00180       const Double_t c=_detectorAngleZXCos;
00181       const Double_t s=_detectorAngleZXSin;
00182 
00183 
00184       Double_t delta_x = a_position[0];
00185       Double_t delta_z = a_position[2];
00186 
00187       //CRP 26/1/07 To my mind this is the wrong rotation matrix      
00188       //a_position[0]=c*delta_x - s *delta_z ;
00189       //a_position[2]=s*delta_x + c *delta_z;
00190 
00191       //This seems to be more correct
00192       a_position[0]=c*delta_x + s *delta_z ;
00193       a_position[2]=-s*delta_x + c *delta_z;
00194 
00195     }
00196 
00197     for(UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00198       a_position[i]+=_detectorPos[kEffective][i];
00199     }
00200 
00201 //     std::cout << "detect. x=" << _detectorPos[kEffective][0]
00202 //            << " y=" << _detectorPos[kEffective][1]
00203 //            << " z=" << _detectorPos[kEffective][2]
00204 // //            << "\tmodule: x=" << _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getX()
00205 // //                 << " y=" << _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getY()
00206 // //            << " z=" << _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getZ()
00207 // //            << "cell:"
00208 // //         << " x=" << _moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()].getCellXPos(cell_index)
00209 // //            << " y=" << _moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()].getCellYPos(cell_index)
00210 //                    << "\thit: x=" << a_position[0]
00211 //                    << " y=" << a_position[1]
00212 //            << " z="  << a_position[2]
00213 //                    << std::endl;
00214 
00215     return a_position;
00216   }

00223     return module_index<getNModules();

00229   const ModuleDescription &getModuleDescription(UInt_t module_index) const {
00230 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00231     if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size() || _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00232       std::stringstream message;
00233       message << "Alignment::getNCellsPerModule> Module " << module_index << "is not defined.";
00234       throw range_error(message.str());
00235     }
00236 #endif
00237     UInt_t module_type=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType();
00238     return _moduleTypeList[module_type];
00239   };

00242   UInt_t getNCellsPerModule(UInt_t module_index) const
00243 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00244     throw (range_error)
00245 #endif
00246     {
00247 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00248       if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size() || _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00249         std::stringstream message;
00250         message << "Alignment::getNCellsPerModule> Module " << module_index << "is not defined.";
00251         throw range_error(message.str());
00252       }
00253 #endif
00254       // std::cout << "Query nr of cells for module " << module_index << " which is of the type " << (UInt_t) _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType() << "->"
00255       //        << _moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()].getNCells()
00256       //        << std::endl;
00257       return _moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()].getNCells();
00258   }

00351   ThreeVector_t getPosition() const 
00352   {
00353     ThreeVector_t position;
00354     position[0]=_detectorPos[kEffective][0];
00355     position[1]=_detectorPos[kEffective][1];
00356     position[2]=_detectorPos[kEffective][2];
00357 
00358     return position;
00359   }

00363   ThreeVector_t getModuleProperCenter(UInt_t module_index) const 
00364 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00365     throw (range_error)
00366 #endif
00367   {
00368 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00369     if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size() || _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00370       std::stringstream message;
00371       message << "Alignment::getNCellsPerModule> Module " << module_index << "is not defined.";
00372       throw range_error(message.str());
00373     }
00374 #endif
00375     UInt_t module_type=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType();
00376     const ModuleDescription &module_description = _moduleTypeList[module_type];
00377 
00378     ThreeVector_t position;
00379     position[0]=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getX()+module_description.getWidth()*.5;
00380     position[1]=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getY()+module_description.getHeight()*.5;
00381     position[2]=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getZ();
00382     return position;
00383   }

00398 #endif
00399 
00400     ThreeVector_t position;
00401     position[0]=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getX();
00402     position[1]=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getY();
00403     position[2]=_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getZ();
00404     return position;
00405   }

00409   ThreeVector_t getModulePosition(UInt_t module_index) const 
00410   {
00411     ThreeVector_t position=getModuleProperPosition(module_index);
00412     return transformPosition(position);
